member.name: T:Cosmos.Disposables.DisposableBase
member.summary:
A base class for properly implementing the synchronous dispose pattern.
Implement OnDispose to handle disposal.
同步释放模式的基类，通过实现 OnDispose 来处理。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Disposables.DisposableBase.OnDispose
member.summary:
When implemented will be called (only once) when being disposed.
当释放时调用此方法（且仅一次）。

member.summary:
Disposable state base.
可释放状态基类

member.summary:
Was disposed.
标识是否已释放。

member.name: M:Cosmos.Disposables.DisposableStateBase.AssertIsAlive(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Will throw if the object is disposed or has started disposal.
member.param: When true, will also throw if between alive and disposing states.

member.name: M:Cosmos.Disposables.DisposableStateBase.OnBeforeDispose
member.summary: On before dispose

member.name: E:Cosmos.Disposables.DisposableStateBase.BeforeDispose
member.summary:
BeforeDispose will be triggered once right before disposal commences.
在释放之前触发一次 BeforeDispose。

member.summary: Start dispose

member.summary: Dispose of

member.summary: Disposal State: Currently living and available.

member.summary: Disposal State: Special case where still accessible, but on it's way to being disposed.

member.summary: Is currently in the process of being disposed.

member.summary: Has completed disposal.
